name: Another Silly Point And Click Adventure
name_original: Another Silly Point And Click Adventure
description:
Another Silly Point And Click Adventure (A.S.P.A.C.A)

This random guy has arrived to a land full of clichés. Help him in his quest to escape and probably, be the hero of this silly adventure.

Note

You might encounter sound glitches in the web version. Refreshing the page once after loading the game the first time might solve them. If not, the desktop versions should work better.

Controls

Use the mouse to move around the scene. Click items from your inventory to use them or give them to other characters.

Team members

DNA.tn (Nat): Character designer/artist

Irene Centelles: Environment designer/artist

Marco Postman: Sound designer and music composition

Javier Montenegro: Game and Narrative designer

Miguel Nicolás: Programmer and animator

Open-source

This game is open sourced under MIT license on Github.
